metadata.title: CVE-2021-40944 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In GPAC MP4Box 1.1.0, there is a Null pointer reference in the functiongf_filter_pid_get_packet function in src/filter_core/filter_pid.c:5394, asdemonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
gpac-modules-base - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
libgpac12 - 2.0.0+dfsg1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0+dfsg1-2').
